mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.object_id AS "objectId", a.object_name AS "objectName", s.name AS "objectName1", su.name AS "objectName2", su.id as "user.id", a.year AS "year", a.month AS "month", a.day AS "day", a.amount AS "amount", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", syu.name as "createBy.name", uys.name as "updateBy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office s on s.id = a.object_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su on su.id = a.object_id left join sys_user syu on syu.id=a.create_id left join sys_user uys on uys.id=a.update_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_op_plan( id, object_id, object_name, year, month, day, amount, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{objectId}, #{objectName}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{amount}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_op_plan SET object_id = #{objectId}, object_name = #{objectName}, `year` = #{year}, `month` = #{month}, `day` = #{day}, amount = #{amount}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
